name: Food Fight (itch) (SunnyShadow, Nina Hanau, MartimG, sagar shrestha)
name_original: Food Fight (itch) (SunnyShadow, Nina Hanau, MartimG, sagar shrestha)
description:
∎∎∎ ABOUT ∎∎∎

Food Fight is a arcade-style shooter made within 2 weeks at UE's Juice & Satisfaction class with Peter Jürgens.

∎∎∎ DESCRIPTION ∎∎∎

In this pixel shooter, you play as a chef fighting against mutant food. Traverse your diner, throw your utensils, and eliminate all those tasty enemies!

∎∎∎ REPOSITORY ∎∎∎

Check out our repository.

∎∎∎ CREDITS ∎∎∎

∎ Martim Grosner (Code)

∎ Nina Hanau (Art)

∎ Sagar Shrestha (Art, Code)

∎ Sunaina "Sunny" Miller (Art)

∎∎∎ University of Applied Sciences Europe ∎∎∎

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Peter Jürgens "Juice & Satisfaction"  (WinterSemester 2021/22)
